scripts.aave:oracle:sepolia: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const {AaveV3Sepolia}=require('@bgd-labs/aave-address-book'); const {ethers}=require('ethers'); const provider=new ethers.JsonRpcProvider(process.env.SEPOLIA_RPC); const abi=['function getPriceOracle() view returns (address)']; (async()=>{const addr=AaveV3Sepolia.POOL_ADDRESSES_PROVIDER; const c=new ethers.Contract(addr,abi,provider); const o=await c.getPriceOracle(); console.log('ORACLE=',o);})();"
scripts.aave:price:sepolia: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const {AaveV3Sepolia}=require('@bgd-labs/aave-address-book'); const {ethers}=require('ethers'); const provider=new ethers.JsonRpcProvider(process.env.SEPOLIA_RPC); const abiPAP=['function getPriceOracle() view returns (address)']; const abiOracle=['function getAssetPrice(address) view returns (uint256)','function BASE_CURRENCY_UNIT() view returns (uint256)']; (async()=>{const pap=AaveV3Sepolia.POOL_ADDRESSES_PROVIDER; const c=new ethers.Contract(pap,abiPAP,provider); const oracleAddr=await c.getPriceOracle(); const o=new ethers.Contract(oracleAddr,abiOracle,provider); const price=await o.getAssetPrice(process.env.ASSET); let base; try{ base=await o.BASE_CURRENCY_UNIT(); }catch{} console.log('ORACLE=',oracleAddr); console.log('ASSET=',process.env.ASSET); console.log('PRICE=',price.toString()); if(base) console.log('BASE_CURRENCY_UNIT=',base.toString());})();"
